title: Always Consumed
description: NOTE:**This is a Valentine's Day NOVELLA**This is not a 4th book. This doesn't change the outcome of Seth and Olivia's story from Forever Consumed. This is for the fans who want to spend Valentine's Day with their favorite fighter! :) In the beginning, you have sex.Lots of it. Then, somewhere in the middle, you lose it. Olivia and Seth are stuck in a rut—a busy, sexless rut—and with Valentine's day fast approaching, Olivia wants to force them out of their comfort zones and into fresher waters. Seth, however, believes the trick to recapturing their passion lies in their beginning.With plans in motion this Valentine's day, Seth and Olivia attempt to rekindle their spark. Does Seth have what it takes to sweep Olivia off her feet all over again?Or is the rut too sticky to pull themselves out of?
author: Skyla Madi
